data_description.from_number: The phone number to initiate the call with.

menu.title: Twilio Live Call
menu.description: Configure events to be fired when phrases are detected.

data_description.events: To edit or remove an event, select one of the events listed. To add a new event, use the 'Add Event' action.

edit_event.title: Edit Event
edit_event.description: Configure the event that will be fired.

data_description.event: Event must be lowercase alphanumeric or '_' characters.

list_phrases.title: Phrases
list_phrases.description: Phrases configured that trigger this event.

data_description.phrases: To edit or remove a phrase, select one of the phrases listed. To add a new phrase, use the 'Add Phrase' action.

edit_phrase.title: Edit Phrase
edit_phrase.description: Configure a short phrase to trigger the event

data_description.phrase: Phrase can be a simple string or a regular expression.
